function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission through close contact and body fluids","Impact":"High infection rate and rapid spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing, use of masks, and proper hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, and air purification technologies","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, government, and individuals"},{"Description":"Transmission through contaminated objects","Impact":"Increased risk of infection through shared surfaces and objects","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of commonly touched surfaces and objects","Technologies":"UV-C sanitization, self-cleaning surfaces, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and cleaning staff","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning services, and individuals"},{"Description":"Impact on healthcare system","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, limited resources, and compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Increase in healthcare capacity, implementation of telemedicine, and allocation of medical supplies","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, medical supply chain management systems, and hospital management software","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and medical staff","Owner":"Health authorities, government, and healthcare organizations"}]}
